title: Timeline
content:
Learning Vision by Timeline# Follow the chronological evolution of Computer Vision technology.
~2012: Classical Computer Vision# Linear Algebra Geometry SIFT & HOG 2012-2015: The Rise of CNN# Convolution Backpropagation AlexNet VGG ResNet Classification 2015-2017: Detection & Segmentation# IoU & NMS YOLO Faster R-CNN U-Net Detection Segmentation 2017-2019: Emergence of Attention# Attention Transformer 2020-2021: Vision Transformer & CLIP# ViT CLIP Contrastive Learning Self-supervised Learning 2021-2022: The Diffusion Era# Diffusion Process Stable Diffusion Generation 2023: Controllable Generation & SAM# ControlNet SAM 2023-2024: VLM & DiT# VLM DiT Vision-Language 2024-Present: 3D & Video Generation# NeRF 3D Gaussian Splatting 3D Vision
